solution_line_template: If Wendy received a scholarship worth ${wendy_scholarship}, Kelly, who received twice as much, received {kelly_multiplier}*${wendy_scholarship} = ${kelly_scholarship}
Together, Wendy and Kelly received Scholarship worth ${kelly_scholarship}+${wendy_scholarship} = $<<{kelly_scholarship}+{wendy_scholarship}={wendy_and_kelly}>>{wendy_and_kelly}
Nina received a scholarship worth ${nina_less_than_kelly} less than Kelly's amount, a total of ${kelly_scholarship}-${nina_less_than_kelly} = ${nina_scholarship}
Together, the three received scholarship worth ${nina_scholarship}+${wendy_and_kelly} = $<<{nina_scholarship}+{wendy_and_kelly}={total_scholarship}>>{total_scholarship}
